item.title: Accor hotels will be providing newspapers and magazines digitally starting in 2015
item.description: Accor, partnering with PressReader, is launching a complimentary information service across its hotel group by early 2015. This initiative aligns with Accor’s Leading Digital Hospitality strategy, focused on incorporating and enhancing digital aspects throughout the guest experience. Through “Accor Press by PressReader,” hotel guests can access over 3,000 international and local publications on their smartphones, laptops, or tablets, using various operating systems (iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows). Guests can access “Accor Press by PressReader” through the hotel’s Wi-Fi, allowing them to download articles, newspapers, and magazines for offline reading.
